body.name: Clamp Lamp with Flexible Gooseneck, Eye-Caring Architect Task Lamp, 18W LED 3 Modes 6 Brightness, Modern Desk Light for Home Office ,Remote Control and Touch (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23. Order within 19 hrs
features: 💡【Super Wide and Bright 1511 Lumen 】With a 18.2 inch 18W LED light bar and 25.2inch flexible gooseneck, which will illuminate entire desk, ideal for a multi-monitor workstation, large table for home or office. Maximum working height up to 28.5inch, A good LED desk light for working from home

💡【Stepless Dimming with two control ways】 LED lamp has 3 color modes for warm light(3000K), warm white light(4000K), white light(6000K). Each lighting mode has 6 brightness dimming levels. So there are 18 lighting modes to meet all requirements. This architect desk lamp is controlled by touch sensitive switch on lamp bar or a remote controller, very conveniently

💡【Eye Protection and Memory Function】 Our clamp light is composed of 96 LED beads, it has uniform brightness, NO GLARE, NO FLICKERING, soft light, which can protect eyesight and reduce eye strain, It is ideal for reading, drawing, sewing, working, studying. The clamp desk lamp is a good help for kids & bookworms, one key for reading mode, memory function can keep the mode and brightness last used

💡【Space Saving and Modern Style】 Task light with sturdy metal clamp, which can support a tabletop thickness up to 2.6 inches. It holds the gooseneck lamp securely in place. The metal clamp is also equipped with a silicone pad to avoid scratching table. The flexible gooseneck study lamp, which can be adjusted 360° to provide multi-directional lighting, and is easy to carry and more save space than stand-up desk lamp

💡【Quality Warranty】SHLINUX always supply good quality led lamp. what included in box : A Shlinux led desk light, An English Manual & Quality Power Adapter and warranty service, and 24H friendly customer support

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SHLINUX Upgrade 18W Bright Led Gooseneck Desk Lamp Illuminate Entire Workbench SHLINUX clamp lamp has 96 LED Beads,18.2 inch lamp bar in length, offer 1511 Lumen, about 100w incandescent bulb equivalent, to illuminate every corner of your table,Born with 360°adjustable gooseneck design with durable metal clamp, SHLINUX study lamp is fully diffused and lighting stably and gently without flickering, also which can prevent blue light damaged to the eyes. It is featured with memory function,then your last lighting setting will be turned on again when work lamp was powered-on,very convenient. saving space with a metal clamp supports to 2.6inch/7.5cm wide desk, fix the clamp light where needed, it won't take any desk space. It supports 3 colors and 6 brightness levels under each color mode,you will get 18 lighting modes to meet all your daily requirements
NO LIMIT LIGHT DIRECTION, NO SHADOW !

Specifications: Material: metal + silicone Light bar length: 18.2 inch/ 46 cm LED numbers: 96 Led beads Lumen: 1511 Lumen Brightness: 6 levels Color temperature: 3000K-6000K CRI: RA>95 Control type: Touch & Remote SHLINUX Architect Desk Clamp Lamp Upgrade Horizontal lighting bar with Flexible Gooseneck This work light is most suitable for a workbench with 1 or 2 computers, providing enough brightness, the task lamp is light, easy to install, the lighting angle can be adjusted freely, suitable for work, study, reading. No flickering LEDs and diffused lighting gently 360°flexible gooseneck design allow bend to any direction Durable structure with metal and silicone Metal Clamp: 2.6 inch/7.5 cm thickness desk edge Maximum Lighting height: 28.5 inch

EASY TO CONTROL THIS MODERN DESK LAMP It supports two types to control the study lamp Sensitive touch (one key will finish all functions select exclude the timer) Short touch will change the colorHolding touch will change the brightness Remote Control Dimming Up / Down: 6 Brightness levelsColors Select: Warm white / white / warmTiming setting: 3 minutes(one press)/ 30 minutes( twice)/60 miutes(three times)Mode select: Sleeping mode / Reading mode
SUPER BRIGHT DESK LAMP, SUITABLE for DETAILED OPERATION

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must Have Space Saver!
reviews.reviewText: A must have for any college student who is already lacking room in the dorm! Easy to set up, takes up little to no room, adjusts to height you need for different things (down over papers or facing outward to help light up the room), sturdy, and cannot say enough good things about this lamp! You could even clamp it on to a raised bed (in a dorm, bunk bed or for an overhead light for your bed - clamp it onto you headboard) for light on your bedside! On the pricier side for a lamp. Although, being LED (long lasting), the space saving, and adjustability it worth the price. 3 color modes ranging from warm to white. Adjustable lighting from 10% to 100% brightness. Remote (convenient if you use it as a bed side lamp!)!!! Flexible gooseneck, so easily adjusts to your perfect angle and height! Slender, wide design to cover a large surface area. Must buy for any college student, office, and home!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get you one, you won't regret it!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love this lamp desk so much very happy I went with this over the ones you clamp on the side.Only 1 CON for me but its not even a big deal at all.PRO-Easy setup-Flexible gooseneck for adjustments-Great quality-Very bright w/ 3 color temperature with 6 brightness level-Great light coverage for 48x24" desk-Best PRO is remote for full control which allows for auto-shutoffCON-On full brightness its can be hot/warm to the touch but you most likely won't touch it if you are using the remote

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little light for the money
reviews.reviewText: This light can get very bright, so really appreciate the dimmer control and that it includes a remote control to easily adjust brightness as well as tone (warm/cool). Sturdy clamp to attach to desk. Good buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice lamp.
reviews.reviewText: Good remote and nice control over the lighting. Remembers settings when it's turned on. There's a night mode button on the remote that flips it to a warm and dim preset which is perfect for my setup.One complaint: I like that you can turn the lamp on via a touch at the top, but you can't turn it off the same way. A second tap just flips it to a different preset and does nothing after that. I'd very much prefer one tap on, one tap off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great lamp for the price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Got this lamp for lighting up my desk for studying and projects. Like it so far! Great value, as long as it will last (read note).Pros:Fairly sturdy. Minor con, the diffuser panel has a little play to it.Bright. It lights up my desk very well, and adds dim light to the whole room all by itself (Can't really tell on the video). Color rendering seems pretty good, and the color temperature presets are quite satisfactory.Ease of use. Touch controls work smoothly. The remote works well, not absolutely necessary, but the presets (nightlight, reading) and timer are nice to have. The gooseneck has good reach as well.Cons:Lowest brightness setting is too bright to be a night light. I don't use nightlights tho, so it doesn't bother me.The touch control only sense right in the center, so you have to be a little accurate.The neck has a tendency to loosen out of the base a tiny bit, if adjusting the lamp orientation.Note:I had to issue a replacement, because the first lamp died within a couple of hours. The replacement works fantastically. There is also a lifetime warranty from the manufacturer, I registered and got a response fairly quickly. So, I hope manufacturer will have my back if the lamp fails later on. I will update if anything happens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is so convenient and easy to use. It comes with the remote, which makes everything much easier to control. I really needed this, but nothing really works with my monitor setting since I have to monitor and one of them, I like to leave it sideways. The gooseneck of this land was long enough to go over both of my monitors, so I just needed one. Great quality and good price! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I own two
reviews.reviewText: Let me start by saying I have enjoyed these lamps very much. So much that I own two of them. I have an L-shaped desk 55" to either side and use one in the middle of each leaf to light my whole desktop. The remote is handy and controls both lamps. However, I have had issues once in a while when I attempt to turn them off, the remote will turn off one but not the other. Which causes them to get out of sink. Easy fix, just tap the top touch sensitive power switch and turn the other one off and then they are back in sink for the next time you use your remote.Also I have light sensitivity issues with my eyes and am easily prone to getting migraines. With the different light temp and brightness settings, its a non issue as I can easily adjust the light source of both lamps simultaneously to match however I'm feeling for the day. These lamps are dim enough to not over power my computer or drawing when using my light pad, but bright enough I can easily see to read, write, and draw without straining my eyes.A plus and minus though, the neck of the lamp is adjustable and flexes whatever direction you want it to go. While this is nice for initial placement once you have it set how you want it, I recommend leaving it alone after that. From past experiences with items of this nature, with flexable necks, the flexibility can become loose over time from bending too much and the weight of the light head can drag the neck down keeping the lamp from staying where you want it. If you find that you need to adjust the placement of the light head frequently then this might not be the product for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of Light
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this light! It was easy to assemble and place. It produces sufficient lighting and the lighting is adjustable. A handy lightweight remote is provided. Hurry get yours before they are all gone!
